title: 服务器报错
author: linziqun
txt_content:
30.11 07:05:56 [服务器] 警告 [07:05:56][FINE][noppes.npcs.LogWriter:71] Wed Nov 30 07:05:56 CST 2016
30.11 07:05:56 [服务器] 警告 [07:05:56][FINE][noppes.npcs.controllers.ScriptController:58] Script Engines Available:
30.11 07:05:56 [服务器] 警告 [07:05:56][FINE][noppes.npcs.controllers.ScriptController:64] Scala: .scala
求告知
0.11 07:07:19 [服务器] 警告 WorldManager: Can't load this world because the folder was deleted/moved: quandi
30.11 07:07:19 [服务器] 警告 Use '/mv remove' to remove it from the config!
30.11 07:07:19 [服务器] 警告 WorldManager: Can't load this world because the folder was deleted/moved: 1
30.11 07:07:19 [服务器] 警告 Use '/mv remove' to remove it from the config!
30.11 07:07:22 [服务器] 警告 [07:07:22][FINE][noppes.npcs.controllers.DialogController:32] 载入 Dialogs
30.11 07:07:22 [服务器] 警告 [07:07:22][FINE][noppes.npcs.controllers.DialogController:34] Done loading Dialogs

replies.author: 鸭蛋只吃黄
replies.txt_content:
WorldManager: Can't load this world because the folder was deleted/moved: quandi
这不很明显的错误嘛，我翻译一下这句话估计楼主自己都知道怎么解决：
因为这个世界的文件夹（quandi）已经被删除/移动，所以无法加载这个世界。
解决方案：
1.配置文件删除这个世界的配置即可
2.从别处复制一个世界过来，然后命名为quandi
答案有用请采纳，没用请追问，谢谢

凋灵兔子 发表于 2016-11-30 08:15
WorldManager: Can't load this world because the folder was deleted/moved: quandi
这不很明显的错误嘛 ...
这个不算报错，你删了世界而已出现那个世界无法读取问题
